name: Family Tree
description:
You are a sweet little birb, ready to leave the nest. To begin your adventure, you must leap from your old nest, brave the river, choose a mate, then create a new home. If you succeed, your lineage continues and the cycle begins again!

Originally created at the 2019 global game jam https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/family-tree

Credits: 

  • Trevor Marsano
  • John Potz
  • William Ritson
  • Gabriella Santiago
  • Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French
